abstract: This work was supported by the 1•3•5 Project for disciplines of excellence-clinical Research Incubation Project(2019HXFH061), West China Hospital, Sichuan University, and the Sichuan University Spark Project (2018SCUH0031)
affiliations: West China Hospital of Sichuan University. We collected baseline data, epidemiological data, clinical characteristics, imaging findings, viral nucleic acid test results, and survival data. SPSS v22.0 was used for statistical analysis. Outcomes were followed up until March
West China Hospital, Sichuan University, and the Sichuan University Spark Project (2018SCUH0031)
author: Yan Kang; Xiao-jin Li; Zhong-Wei Zhang; Bing-Xing Shuai
title: COVID-19 versus non-COVID-19 pneumonia: A retrospective cohort study in Chengdu, China

funding.funding-statement: This work was supported by the 1•3•5 Project for disciplines of excellence-clinical Research Incubation Project(2019HXFH061), West China Hospital, Sichuan University, and the Sichuan University Spark Project (2018SCUH0031)
